attributes.action: use his influence to urge the Football Association to establish an independent inquiry into the appropriate punishment for Premier League teams entering into illegal contracts with players and their agents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The situation relating to the punishment meted out to West Ham seems to create a dangerous precedent for the future. Besides relegation, there are other important thresholds in the Premiership (for example this season 1st/ 2nd; 4th/5th; 7th/8th) for which large amounts of revenue are at stake. The Premier League's punishment of West Ham creates incentives for teams to cheat their way to success, with no fear of appropriate punishment.
